WorkItem.Description:
Hi,
I'm using PHPExcel 1.7.3c , I noticed that when setCellValue find some character (èéòç°à§£ìù) cuts every other character after that.
I just want to report this hoping to help somehow, I 'solved' the problem just using some str_replace.
 
ps: sorry for my bad english.
WorkItem.Summary: setCellValue doesn't work with some char

Comments.Message: No, I didn't used UTF-8.Btw I tried to force the char-encoding to UTF-8 but nothing changed.

I don't know what your code looks like, or the charset that you're using and how you're trying to convert to UTF-8 (iconv() is probably the best PHP function to use), but PHPExcel works quite happily with UTF-8 characters.
Take a look at cell A5 in the generated 01simple.php Test

I looked 01simple.php and it works, there's no problem with UTF-8 char. So it just a problem of my code, but doesn't matter, I don't need to solve it.
btw thanks :)
